:py:mod:`stp.utils.enum`
========================

.. py:module:: stp.utils.enum

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   This module contains the implementation of a metaclass for defining Enums.



Module Contents
---------------

Classes
~~~~~~~

.. autoapisummary::

   stp.utils.enum.SimpleEnumMeta




.. py:class:: SimpleEnumMeta

   Bases: :py:obj:`type`

   Metaclass for TacticsEnum. Collects all the class attributes and puts it
   in enum_names

   .. py:attribute:: enum_names
      :annotation: :List[str]
